name: Black-Shell Bay
culture_adjustments: stronger clandestine/smuggler subculture within kin clans
harbor courts emphasize expedient, pragmatic rulings over strict legalism
tide-time rites intensified; local tide-calendar variants
apprenticeships shortened for rapid seamanship deployment
navigational auguries more common among pilots
notes: harbor festivals tied to navigation and tidal omens
local economy tolerates organized contraband as de facto income
salt pans require regular labor rotations tied to tide cycles
